Special_Features: Colored titles and Menus (if ran with a compatible terminal)
Description: A simple Tic Tac Toe game that can be played against a computer or another player. The computer has 5 different levels of difficulty, ranging from easy to impossible. The game is played in the terminal and has colored titles and menus if ran with a compatible terminal.

A remake of the cookie clicker game that allows the player to click on a cookie to bake cookies. The player can purchase buildings and upgrades to increase the amount of cookies they gain per click. The game has a stats window that displays the player's current stats and a basic graphics window that displays the game.
